Package Model

Class AppointmentDB

java.lang.Object
Model.AppointmentDB
public class AppointmentDB extends Object
This class gathers all the appointment from the Appointments table within the Database.

      Parameters:
      startRange - start of range ZonedDateTime
      endRange - end of range ZonedDateTime
      Returns:
      Filtered list of appointments based on an input start and end date.

    • getCustomerFilteredAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getCustomerFilteredAppointments(LocalDate apptDate, Integer inputCustomerID) throws SQLException
      getCustomerFilteredAppointments queries DB for all appointments for a specific customer on a specific date. used to find conflicts
      Parameters:
      apptDate - date we are seeing for any possible appointments
      inputCustomerID - customer ID we are checking for
      Returns:
      List of appointments for a specific customer on the input apptDate
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateAppointment

      public static Boolean updateAppointment(Integer inputApptID, String inputTitle, String inputDescription, String inputLocation, String inputType, ZonedDateTime inputStart, ZonedDateTime inputEnd, String inputLastUpdateBy, Integer inputCustomerID, Integer inputUserID, Integer inputContactID) throws SQLException
      updateAppointment takes the specific Appointment ID and updates it in the DB
      Parameters:
      inputApptID - Appointment ID
      inputTitle - Title of the appointment
      inputDescription - Description of appointment
      inputLocation - Location of appointment
      inputType - Type of appointment
      inputStart - Start of appointment
      inputEnd - end of appointment
      inputLastUpdateBy - date/time of update
      inputCustomerID - Customer ID
      inputUserID - User ID
      inputContactID - Contact ID
      Returns:
      Boolean indicating if operation was successful
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • addAppointment

      public static Boolean addAppointment(String inputTitle, String inputDescription, String inputLocation, String inputType, ZonedDateTime inputStart, ZonedDateTime inputEnd, String inputCreatedBy, String inputLastUpdateBy, Integer inputCustomerID, Integer inputUserID, Integer inputContactID) throws SQLException
      addAppointment Takes values and creates a new appointment in the database
      Parameters:
      inputTitle - title of appointment
      inputDescription - description of appointment
      inputLocation - location of appointment
      inputType - type of appointment
      inputStart - start of appointment
      inputEnd - end of appointment
      inputCreatedBy - who created appointment
      inputLastUpdateBy - who updated appointment last
      inputCustomerID - customer ID
      inputUserID - user ID
      inputContactID - contact ID
      Returns:
      Boolean indicating if operation was successful
      Throws:
      SQLException
